price: (147) And We sent him[1306] to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
